eheyin, samruddhi prathilabhin, poroththu lekhana wala sitina ayawalun saha anikuth pirisa sandaha mayi masa laba dimata awashya mudal gewimata amatharawa awashya wana aramudal yojitha paridi samruddhi departhamenthuwa sathu aramudal walin laba ganimata athi apahasuwa menma me wenuwen bhandagaraya wisin aramudal salasa dimata prathipadana nomathi wima yana karunu hethuwen me sadaha awashya aramudal sapaya ganima wenuwen samruddhi labhin, poroththu lekhana wala sitina ha balapamata lak wu menma anikuth adu aadayamlabhin sadaha 2020 mayi masa laba dimata adala rupiyal 5,000 mudala gewimata amatharawa awashya wana rupiyal miliyana 16,000 ka mudala wana rupiyal koti 1,600 ka mudala samruddhi departhamenthuwa sathu mahajana bankuwe saha lanka bankuwe athi surakum lesa bhawitha karamin samruddhi departhamenthuwe kshudra mulya banku aramudala wetha ketikalina naya mudalak lesa labaganima saha ee sadaha sudusu poli anupathayak thiranaya kirimata bankuwa samanga sakachcha kirime balaya bhandagaraye lekam wetha pawarimatath, mema naya mudala laba ganimin mayi masa laba dimata niyamitha mudala laba dime wadasatahana kriyathmaka kirimatath, elesa laba ganna naya mudala nopamawa gewimata awashya katayuthu kirimata idiri asthamenthu gatha bhandagaraye lekamta niyama kirimatath agramathyawaraya wisin idiripath karana lada yojanawata kabinat anumathiya himiwa athi bawath bandula gunawardhana wadiduratath sadahan kaleya.
